description:
Python `CFFI (C Foreign Function
Interface) <https://cffi.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`__ provides a
powerful set of tools for interacting with C from Python.

In this tutorial, I will cover the basics of using CFFI, including the
various modes it can be used in. I will also cover several of the more
advanced aspects, such as callbacks, and describe the mechanisms for
distributing modules that use Python CFFI.
title: An introduction to interfacing with C using CFFI
